Articles.Content: so i edited the files of the grip pad attach node to the drain valve and for some reason when i saved it removed all the strut panels and i dont remember the original attach node for drain valve so can someone put it in the replys so i can paste it in to the .cfg file of the drain valve

8 hours ago, icantthink said:

so i edited the files of the grip pad attach node to the drain valve and for some reason when i saved it removed all the strut panels and i dont remember the original attach node for drain valve so can someone put it in the replys so i can paste it in to the .cfg file of the drain valve

If you are on steam cut/paste the edited file somewhere else and then verify game files,

then you should have the original version and you can copy it somewhere else to have the reference.
